channel.title: Unable to download.
channel.description: Not sure if this is just me, knowing my luck it probably is but I'm unable to make my way to the release page, it loads the timer for a brief second than redirects me and stops loading on a blank page. Is anyone else having this problem? Or am i even looking in the wrong place for a link was hoping to play this before work tonight (Y).

item.title: Unable to download.
item.dc:creator: Insomniak
item.description:
Black Mesa won’t be released for another 10 hours and 44 minutes. The clock on your computer is probably set wrong. Set it to the correct time and the timer countdown will be accurate.
